Reviews.Title: “Quite Good”
Reviews.Author: Missy S
Reviews.Content: Very clean, great breakfast, 2 min walk from Taksim Square, nice bathroom. A bit small beds (double), extremely slow motion elevators!

Reviews.Title: “Great location,not a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Marialena P
Reviews.Content: My mother with her friends stayed in Seminal for 5 nights. It's a hotel situated in Taxim square.It's a vibrant square and you never feel unsafe. What they liked: -Location -Room size -free Wifi -good breakfast -price What they didn't like: -Beds were not really comfortable although big -They could hear other people from nearby rooms.No soundproof! -No view -Not any lobby to relax and have a drink It's a quite small family runned hotel.However it's not a 4 star hotel as advertised.

Reviews.Title: “Good and cheap hotel”
Reviews.Author: Christina426
Reviews.Content: Budget hotel in the center of Taksim.Clean, comfortable and good breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel”
Reviews.Author: nohamms
Reviews.Content: I stayed in Istanbul for a week in this hotel.I was with my husband and 3 kids ,we had a double room and a triple room .Both rooms were adequate.The bathroom was very clean and the shower area was very good.The2 rooms had a flat screen TV but they were not spacious,the walls were extremely thin ,you can hear all the sounds of the adjacent rooms also they can hear you.The worst thing about this hotel was the breakfast.Food was of very low quality,almost uneatable.I had breakfast only once in the hotel because of its low quality and for the rest of the week my family and I had breakfast out ,in a nearby "simit saray",although our stay was bed and breakfast. hotel is centrally located in Taksim square and near to the Metro and bus station.Istanbul was delightful that we didn't mind eating outside the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Not a hotel but HELL!”
Reviews.Author: JonRasocha
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this "so called" hotel from 1.-4.2. What you can see on following picture was taken at 11:13 p.m. (!) from my room window. The workers are preparing the adjacent house base ALL THE NIGHT. You can't ever fall asleep due to terrible noise of rolling stones and blowing trucks. Hotel Seminal should be closed at least until the construction all aroud finishes.

Reviews.Title: “A 3** superior hotel.”
Reviews.Author: LFKT
Reviews.Content: The greatest thing about this hotel is the location (near taksim square) but there is nothing more that worth to mention. Staff was kind but all seem "afraid" and did not smile a lot. Except, a delayed wake up call on the first day nothing bad happened If allowed, I would make a suggestion for the breakfast time "please, inform your guests that you are going to take away the products of the buffet 5 minutes before you do that". A gentleman from the kitchen, started taking aways quickly products on time but then he had to stop because some people who were sitting already in therestaurant start getting additional things fromt the buffet quickly. Talking about the breakfast, we didn't enjoy it at all. Even if there was a great variety of products, most of them didn't taste good (but this is related of cource, with our personal food habits). We thank Mr Veyse (in the spa area) who was very friendly and professional. We cannot say the same thing for the other lady who seems totally unexperienced. What is more, the spa area was a cozy and clean place but there was some mold on the ceiling. Moreover, some people, would prefer a relaxing music instead of other songs in the spa. If possible, transfer the phone line in the reception desk when spa employees have treatments and are busy with your guests. I could stay again in the hotel or suggest it to friends but I wil not choose it next time because there are too many hotels in the area and i will look for a real 4* hotel.

Reviews.Title: “hotel is terrible”
Reviews.Author: abulaila
Reviews.Content: seminal hotel is not a 4 star hotel, i would rate it as a 2 star hotel. there is an ongoing constructions all around the hotel which cause a horrible noise in a degree we couldnt sleep well. the AC is not working in a proper way and after it was fixed they changed it into heat without informing us and when we called them they claimed its winter time although the atmosphere inside the hotel was almost warm and we couldnt open the window because of the constructions and street noise in addition they didnt give us the room as we requested (double standard room) instead the room was with three single beds (like twin rooms) the front desk staff were rude to us there was no non smoking rooms the room next to us was full of smokers filling the whole corridor and our room with smoke. generally it was a bad experience, wrong choice ans it was thw worst hotel i have ever been in. you could find better hotels in the same area with better prices

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable but not 4 stars”
Reviews.Author: Lorca16
Reviews.Content: A hotel which does not accomplish western european standards of 4 stars. Average breakfast. Towels, sheets and carpets clean but too much used if not aged. Refrigerator in use only during our presence in the room, thus not cold water in August. Located in a narrow commercial street but near the centre of Constantinoupolis (the name of the city for us Greeks). Positive elements: Personnel polite and immediately responding to our demands, satisfactory function of air conditionig. My negative answer to the qustion "would you recommend it to a friend?" is relative: It means that I would not recommend it as a 4 stars hotel. Unfortunately, being members of a group we were not aware of the price so I cannot express my opinion about the ratio quality/price (rapport qualitÃ©/prix)

Reviews.Title: “Staff great, hotel not so great”
Reviews.Author: Ru84
Reviews.Content: From the outside it looked fine, but it was a real disappointment. We were first shown to rooms that stank of cigarettes. We ended up on the 1st floor which was a mistake as I didn't sleep well because of all the noise from outside. Breakfast was ok. The room itself was pretty basic and I felt myself scratching... the safe didn't work, the sheets were marked, and it had a hip-bath/ shower in an old bathroom. I would only recommend it if you want to stay in this area and it's cheap.

Reviews.Title: “very noisy”
Reviews.Author: HidoMaru
Reviews.Content: wall is so thin like paper, all voice & TV sound leak into the next room. I will never choose this for myself.

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4*, just average”
Reviews.Author: allalouff
Reviews.Content: We were obliged to stay here as we could not find anything better. We were moved here because we could not stay at the hotel we originally booked (read my review for Green Park Taksim). The rooms are tiny, the beds and the closet are new but the bedside cabinet, chairs,the coffee table and the luggage table are very old and weared. The bathroom was also tiny, with shower but at least it was new, though not very functional. There was no protective cabin for the shower and every time we used it the water was coming out in the room!!! There was not even a tray for the hand soap whitch we were oblidged to leave on its packing paper every time we used it. The towels were of poor quality also. The carpet inside the room had several stains on it and the A/C did not work so we had to open the window and let not only the fuss but also the dust and the insects inside! Breakfast was of very limited choice and same everyday. Stay here only if have nowhere else to go. There are much better hotels at Taksim. (check out the Point hotel)

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably priced hotel on a pedestrain street.”
Reviews.Author: renee6221
Reviews.Content: Hotel was located on a pleasant pedestrian walkway. While this made it a bit hard for the taxis to access, it made a pleasant walking experience when going out to dinner. Several restaurants in very short walking distance. I was at a conference at the Military Museum and this hotel is a very easy 5 minute walk from that. Great internet access. Room was small, but clean. Very reasonably priced. Staff was helpful. Hotel has a turkish bath, but I did not get a chance to use it.

Reviews.Title: “Truly lovely.”
Reviews.Author: Spiral_Fire
Reviews.Content: We stayed seven nights. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room clean and comfortable. The breakfast buffet served tasty, healthy food, including coffee of a quality that one would expect from a good hotel in Turkey, and the workers there were really sweet to our baby. We went twice to the swimming pool and sauna. I was able to use the Internet on my Mac in our room. The staff at the front desk received messages for us and gave us helpful directions around town when we needed them. The view out the window of our room was of a bunch of dirty buildings, but the hotel is not responsible for that. The great location of the Seminal -- right off Taksim Square -- more than makes up for it.

Reviews.Title: “Just OK..not a 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: VJYDubai
Reviews.Content: The only reason you want to book this hotel is for the location. It is at a walking distance from the famous Istithlal shopping street and centrally located for transporation options ( Bus, Metro , Etc ) You have some nice Kebab restaurants around the hotel too. Keep in mind that this hotel has a lot of Arabic guests all time around as they cater to middle east market. So you would have Olives for breafast and other basic items ( eggs, sausages, etc )and almost the same breafast buffet every day. They ripped us off by charging 60 USD for making just 4 local mobile calls - so avoid using thier tel lines. rooms are small - no view at all, but service is OK. But they are definately not a 4 star hotel - Avoid this hotel if possible as they are lot of better hotels in the same area.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, bathroom needs work”
Reviews.Author: MyEurope
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for three nights on a tour. The hotel lobby, bar, and restaurant are very comfortable and in good condition. The bedroom was comfortable, the beds were adequate, there is a safe and a wet bar in the room. The bathroom needs work. The shower is two levels, hard to stand up in. The crown molding had fallen off three of four walls and overall the bathroom needed an overhaul. However, plenty of hot water and it was cleaned daily. Great location near Taksim square. Friendly staff. Breakfast buffet was fair but adequate.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel, not a 4* though”
Reviews.Author: sugar_angel
Reviews.Content: i stayed here with a 2 friends for 4 days and dont really have anything bad to say about this. there was a stange smell sometimes and once the water was running orange but only for about 10 minutes. we were up on the 9th floor and the view was fab!! you could see right over the city it was amazing!! the hotel is only a few minutes walk from taksim square where you can get taxis or the tram. we didnt eat in the restaurant so cant comment on that nor did we use the pool :( all in all although it is advertised as a 4* hotel, you pay for what you get as the room rates are quite cheap. i would recommend it for people who want a nice cheap hotel near taksim for a few nights.

Reviews.Title: “Guest Privacy is Exposed”
Reviews.Author: jcortelli
Reviews.Content: I stayed in Seminal after having a horrible two-day experience in Savoy. I hoped to be in a more professional environment in seminal as I paid a little more than what I spent in Savoy per night. A few issues here, the registration card is filled by the front desk clerk. I would personally like to write my personal information in the registration card myself, as there is a bit of security issues involved. But instead, they hold your passport and tell you that theyâ€™ll bring it to your room after they fill the registration card. I mentioned security so here it goes. I was there on a business trip in November 2005. The lady who was contracted by me on a few architectural work seeked a few personal questions about me from the front desk clerks. When I asked her how did she find out all about my personal information, she said for a few bucks, they released all the information they copied from my passport. My date of birth and where I am from in the States and etc. I was extremely disappointed and felt so insecure for my privacy was exposed illegally. Lucky you seminal you are not in he States, Iâ€™d have you in court and make you pay your penalty dearly for that misconduct. I will neither stay nor will recommend anyone to stay there unless you get your acts together and respect the privacy of your guests.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel very cool very proper”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: i have see the review of december 2004 i was in this hotel for 4 days 30.9.2005/3.10.2005 service very good ,nice room very proper good location at taksim 8/10 for me and i travel a lot....i know the life in the hotel

Reviews.Title: “Smelly Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MNP75
Reviews.Content: This is definetely the worst hotel we have ever stayed. Although it rates itself as a 4*, it is not even a 3*. The first thing that strikes you when you enter the lobby is smell. I could not figure out the origin of that smell but it was like dirty linen plus bad food plus uncleaned toilet plus moisture from the dirty pool plus cheap air refreshner and may be million of other things you do not want to think about. Not surprisingly, all these elements were present in this hotel. When we got up in our room we almost threw out as it was disquisting - the hotel did not clean the room and toilet (water was not even flashed). We had to wait in the room for over one hour (after 6 hours flights and transfer from the airport) while the cleaning man was doing the room before we could even unpack and take shower. We also saw the dirtiest and most terrible dining room where we refused to eat and had our breakfast in small cafes dotted around Taksim square. If you do not want your Istanbul trip become ruined like ours, do not stay in this hotel. In general, I do not recommend to stay somehwere near Taksim square as this not the most pleasant place to stay in Itsnabul. I would pick a place somewhere around the Bosphorus.

HotelInfo.Name: Seminal Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Sehit Muhtar Cad. 23 - 25 | Taksim, Istanbul 80090, Turkey
